trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around August 21st 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm 15, and me and my family went to Las Vegas for a week, after heading out of LV, we decided to check LA out, so we headed out into the desert, forget with high way. But while looking north I saw this red dot come out of the mountains, and hover up into the sky quickly in 4 seconds. I was surprised and curious. 5 minutes later I saw, which looked like a meteor, and I was scared, I was stareing at it as it got closer and closer, it looked like some kind of fire ball. It moved slowly, and did not look like any military craft. And than it zoomed east, and dissapeared. It makes me wonder if life is out there, or if the goverment is inventing new space crafts, or flying old UFOs.
Summary: While vacationing at Las Vegas and heading to LA, I spotted some werid things in the sky.
